channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Security flaws in Freedom Chat app exposed users’ phone numbers and PINs
item.description: The founder of Freedom Chat said the company has reset user PINs and released a new version to app stores.

item.title: Harness hits $5.5B valuation with $240M raise to automate AI’s ‘after-code’ gap
item.description: Goldman Sachs has led Harness's Series E round, with participation from IVP, Menlo Ventures, and Unusual Ventures.

item.title: Runware raises $50M Series A to help make image, video generation easier for developers
item.description: Runware lets developers integrate realtime image generation in their apps, with an affordable pricing model.

item.title: On Me raises $6M to shake up the gift card industry
item.description: On Me raises $6 million for its digital gift card platform that lets users purchase cards categorized by interests rather than being restricted to spe...

item.title: Laptops Have Never Been Cheaper. That Trend Might Reverse in 2026
item.description: Despite all the worries about the economy, laptop prices have never been lower. But in 2026, all of that could change.

item.title: How the Next Big Thing in Carbon Removal Sunk Without a Trace
item.description: With support from Microsoft, Stripe, and Shopify, Running Tide billed itself as on the cutting edge of carbon removal. In the end, it resorted to dump...

item.title: Disney signs deal with OpenAI to allow Sora to generate AI videos featuring its characters
item.description: Disney says that alongside the agreement, it will "become a major customer of OpenAI," as it will use its APIs to build new products, tools, and exper...

item.title: Interest in Spoor’s bird monitoring AI software is soaring
item.description: Spoor's computer vision software can help wind farms, and other industries, track bird populations and migration patterns.

item.title: Port raises $100M at $800M valuation to take on Spotify’s Backstage
item.description: Port offers a proprietary alternative to Spotify's popular devtool catalog Backstage, but with a valuable addition: it can be used to manage AI agents...

item.title: TIME names ‘Architects of AI’ its Person of the Year
item.description: TIME Magazine has named the 'Architects of AI' its Person of the Year, who include Jensen Huang, Elon Musk, Sam Altman, Mark Zuckerberg, Lisa Su, Dari...
